title: Regarding Sales this year
body: Hello, I was just wondering if their would be a legacy skin sale toward the end of this year, and if possible a specific date for it? thanks!

replies.body: Luls of course they will have some form of sale. All they care about are micro transactions and they'd be stupid not to do it around the holiday season.

Legacy skins in LoL is a lie.

If they go on sale again a few years later, they are limited, not legacy.

There's usually the mystery store in a separate tab that might give you legacy skins?

Not sure if they will do the 50% all legacy skins sale like they did 2 years ago.

 In saying so, you never know what RIot will do :)
I would guess there will be one for Christmas.
